answerText: Gargantua[10] Gargantua and his son Pantagruel were created by this author under the pen name Alcofribas Nasier.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 7 | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Grangousier is the father of this character, who was in Gargamelle's womb for eleven months. For 10 points each: [10] Name this character who founded the Abbey of Theleme where the only rule is "do what thou wilt."
